name: Leap of Faith [Scales of Fate Fandisc]
name_original: Leap of Faith [Scales of Fate Fandisc]
description:
A short kinetic visual novel and semi-canon prequel to the upcoming BLVN "Scales of Fate". 

Features:

*A sly doctor(?) and a poor koi boi

*998 words

*A very cool track that may or may not sync up with the dialogue

*You can splash the doctor!

(Credits in-game)
